Hey HostBallers,
We have landed in the world of HostBalls and are here with some latest updates from VMHaus and a great offer. We have just spun up a brand new AMD EPYC hypervisor ready for our VMs.
March 2018 Updates

  • Added new payment method - Alipay
  • VMHaus has acquired our own Cogent (AS174) and LoNAP Internet Exchange ports.

We’ve had a busy few months and we’re not stopping! We’re working on a range of Bonsai features & updates

Offers Section
As always, not everyone likes everyone and everything, it would be a pretty boring world if we did, so we offer a 7-day money back guarantee if the performance isn’t as described. (Money back only applies to PayPal, Alipay currently is unable to be refunded)
Our Features - Instant Activation (Subject to fraud checks)

  • Our new nodes feature AMD EPYC processors giving you Epyc performance for an Epyc price
  • Pure NVMe Powered Storage - It’s even faster than SATA SSDs!
  • One-click OS Install - CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu
  • Custom ISO - Bring your own ISO. (Just submit a ticket)
  • Automated Backup - All VPS are automatically backed up on site.
  • Free DDoS Protection
  • Hourly billing
  • SSH Key Support!
  • BGP Sessions (Just open a ticket with your ASN and prefixes)
  • Free ASN Registration service (for clients who have spent in excess of $50)
  • Low latency to the majority of UK & EU networks via our peering at LINX & LoNAP
